entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-29
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Linker doesn't substitute feature switches when used with 'copy' #95429
    9.0.0
  • [iOS] CultureInfo.DisplayName only shows abbreviation #95427
    9.0.0
  • libcoreclr signal handler may cause stack overflow SIGSEGV on 3rd party library threads #95419
  • ExecutionEngineException on using step into while debugging #95417
  • [HTTP3] [outerloop] Requesting HTTP version 3.0 with version policy RequestVersionExact while unable to establish HTTP/3 connection #95413
    9.0.0
  • [mono] MAUI release mode crash Assertion at /__w/1/s/src/mono/mono/mini/aot-runtime.c:5220, condition `plt_entry' not met #95406
    8.0.x
  • [mono] Regression of BigInteger.Multiply on arm64 AOT-llvm #95403
  • [browser][nodejs] Start app with debugging for console template #95401
    9.0.0
  • ValidateOnStart API doesn't allow dependency loading when using IValidatableObject instead of IValidateOptions<IdentityServerOverridesOptions> #95400
  • Method changes behaviour after optimisation #95394
    9.0.0
  • [mono][wasm] Exception handling failures with filters #95393
    9.0.0
  • Add IsCompleted flag to System.Data.Common.DbTransaction #95399
  • SignedXml.CheckSignature failing for valid Enveloped signature with #xpointer(/) reference #95390
  • JIT: Widespread jitstress failures with "Assertion failed 'node->OperIsLIR()'" #95388
    9.0.0

Closed

  • DateTime.Parse("30.02.2023") throws System.FormatException: String '' was not recognized as a valid DateTime. #95428
  • GeneratedRegex source file RegexGenerator.g.cs not found by debugger #95293
  • [8.0] [wasm] Test failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.TensorPrimitivesTests.MaxMagnitude(tensorLength: 53) #93620
    8.0.x
  • [wasm] Unhandled `System.PlatformNotSupportedException` for crypto tests #94820
  • [outerloop] [NativeAOT] Segmentation fault in System.Runtime.InteropServices.Tests #95414
  • SIGSEGV in System.Numerics.Vectors #94856
    9.0.0
  • Strange 'BinarySearch' behavior with some special unicode characters #95363
  • Enabling InvariantGlobalization breaks int.Parse in WASI apps #94407
    9.0.0
  • Use the `-S` and `-B` Options on the CMake Command Line to Specify Source and Build Directories Instead of Moving with `pushd` #93702
    9.0.0
  • wasmbrowser template has wrong inspecturi #95391
    8.0.x
  • .NET 9, Android: AOT compiler currently fails with an assertion #94880
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tests] The type initializer for 'NetSecurityNative' threw an exception #93104
    9.0.0
  • Things needing System.Net.Security.Native may not work on Bionic #87665
    9.0.0
  • A published blazor wasm app throws a serialization error "Unhandled exception rendering component: ConstructorContainsNullParameterNames" #95409
  • Remove tools-local folder from repo root #36519
    Future
  • Documentation - Cross-Platform-Cryptography Update OAEP SHA-2 Padding Support Matrix #28018
    Future
  • Test failure: System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.RSAKeyFileTests.UseAfterDispose(importKey: False) #85260
    Future
  • Could not use CreateFromEncryptedPemFile to load certificates when using dotnet 7 in FIPS environment. #94800
    Future
  • [outerloop] [NativeAOT] Code generation failed for method System.Linq.Tests.EmptyPartitionTests.SingleInstance() #95367
  • System.Text.Json, addition needed for JsonWriterOptions, to avoid URI serialization issue #95182
  • [API Proposal]: Quic connection keep alive #70090
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Additional QuicConnectionOptions #72984
    9.0.0
  • Improve Unix Console.ReadLine by borrowing from PowerShell's ReadLineFromConsole #94860
    Future
  • del #95375
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.JsonSerializerContext should support deserialization to private members. #95385
  • [NativeAOT] ld.lld: error: undefined symbol: tls_CurrentThread #93942
    Future
  • WritingShouldUpdateWriteTime_After_SetLastAccessTime [FAIL] #95378
  • Discrepancies in reported primitive type size #95366

PullRequests

Created

  • [wasi] Simplify, and clean up target for bundled resource generation #95426
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Support VMR cross arch build #95425
    needs-area-label
  • [workloads] Fix the condition for the workload metrics #95424
    area-Build-mono
  • [8.0] Remove jit-format job in .NET 8.0 branch #95423
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.x
  • [7.0] Remove jit-format job in .NET 7.0 branch #95422
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95418
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • Remove _monoAotBuildshCommand and _monoAotCrossCompileArg from pipelines #95416
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Delete unused FindResourceDuplicates.ps1 script #95412
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] eager allocation of Promise/Task result for async JSImport/JSExport #95411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Revert "Pin the Alpine Arm32 image to previous tag (#94683)" #95410
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0-staging] Disabling mock test #95407
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.x
  • Fixing SignedXml.CheckSignature for enveloped signature with `#xpointer(/)` Reference #95404
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Share unified UTF-8/16 parsing with BigInteger #95402
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fixes for Bionic on x64 #95382
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: removed unneeded throw helper blocks #95379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update test runs to use Alpine 3.16 #95373
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AF_3A to IF_SVE_AQ_3A #95337
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle platform not supported during test discovery. #94844
    area-System.Security
  • Revert "Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux" #95415
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disable EtwManifestGeneration tests on win-x86 #95389
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • [browser] Fix debug URL in lauchSettings.json in wasmbrowser template #95392
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser] js string marshaling by value #95180
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasi] Bundle `runtimeconfig` in the single file bundle #95377
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Replace `pushd/popd` Calls With `-S/-B` CMake Flags in the Build System #94353
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Reduce DynamicallyAccessedMemberTypes on AddOptionsWithValidateOnStart #95135
    area-Extensions-Options
  • Fix _AssemblyInTargetingPack value during servicing #95278
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update README.md to add link to good first issues also #95374
    area-Meta
  • Split out a `TestContext` class from `RepoDirectoriesProvider` #95309
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps, do not enable for NativeAOT tests #94868
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Avoid redundant GetVirtualMemoryLimit syscall #95376
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Delete some native AOT S.P.CoreLib compat suppressions #95380
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use managed ntlm on linux-bionic #95274
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix iOS/tvOS NativeAOT builds #95405
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Pin the Alpine Arm32 image to previous tag (#94683)" #95359
    area-Infrastructure
  • Clear IconHandle when we fold compares #95383
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Additional QuicConnectionOptions #94211
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • JIT: Generalize check for full interruptibility #95299
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add support for fcvt.w instructions to CodeGen::genIntToFloatCast #95327
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Disable System.Net.Quic.Tests.MsQuicTests.ByteMixingOrNativeAVE_MinimalFailingTest on WinSrv2022 #95339
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add regression testing for the STJv8 source generator. #95352
    area-System.Text.Json, test-enhancement, 9.0.0
  • Disable CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok in Windows NativeAoT #95333
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fixes for Bionic on x64 #95313
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Alternative fix for RuntimeHelpers.GetSubArray AOT compatibility warning #95296
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [wasm] CI: trigger only WBT on template changes #95368
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, needs-area-label
  • Upgrade superpmi benchmarks to 9.0 #95372
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Move many interop tests to run in-proc and move many to built in the merged runner itself #94109
    test-enhancement, area-Interop-coreclr
  • Free the tls memory on thread termination #95362
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Replace rsGetRsvdReg with ordinary temp registers #95317
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Add PropertyBuilder implementation #95303
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Clean up GT_NOP #95353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement Interlocked for small types. #92974
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Test macOS runtime test crash dump collection #93989
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, os-mac-os-x, area-Infrastructure
  • [NativeAOT] Aging stacks #95221
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [IGNORE][wasm] debugging debugger tests #94965
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix FormatException message argument #95356
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Make GetKeyedServices(KeyedService.AnyKey) return all services #95308
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • JIT: Enable jump-to-next removal optimization for non-debug code #95340
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi] Add AOT option to existing Wasi.Build.Tests #95281
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, os-wasi
  • [DataTable] Cache boolean result from BinaryNode.EvalBinary #95248
    area-System.Data, community-contribution
  • [JIT] Add BasicBlock::bbFlags helper methods #95139
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Convert HELPER_METHOD_FRAME to QCalls (3/N) #95306
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [RISC-V] Implement NativeWalker. #94853
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [Mono][WIP]Enable runtime tests on android arm64 #89114
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add EventSource event for WaitHandle waits #94737
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] Added an optional HybridGlobalization run of libraries #95324
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [release/8.0-staging] Catch exception when subscribing to NetworkChange #95123
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.x
  • Determine cross based on OS in addition to arch #95312
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement GetSortKey on hybrid mode #95260
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Enumerable.ToArray performance improvement using InlineArray #90459
    area-System.Collections, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Port loop cloning to the new loop representation #95326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Improve System.DirectoryServices interop guidelines conformance #93722
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • System.Console cleanup #93828
    area-System.Console, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] Fix explicitly setting the return type on a dynamic method #95271
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-reflection-mono, 8.0.x
  • Allow specifying IndentText when writing JSON #95292
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add JSON null support for the built-in (ReadOnly)Memory converters. #95325
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • Update coreclr test run scripts #95237
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
